Package org.optim4j.ns

Class LargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A extends Agent,​T>

java.lang.Object
org.optim4j.ns.LargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A,​T>
Type Parameters:
A - a valid solution agent type
T - partially destroyed solution agent type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Optimizer<A>
public class LargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A extends Agent,​T> extends Object implements Optimizer<A>
An implementation of large neighborhood search optimization process.

This implementation accepts a solution agent which is a local optima of the problem domain. The optimization process transforms the same using destroy and repair heuristic over multiple iterations. The new solution in each iteration is accepted based on provided acceptance criteria. The process continues until the completion condition is satisfied.

  • Constructor Details

    • LargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer

      public LargeNeighborhoodSearchOptimizer​(AcceptanceCriteria acceptanceCriteria, CompletionCondition completionCondition, Repairer<T,​A> repairer, Destroyer<A,​T> destroyer, Observer<A,​T> observer)
      Constructs an instance of neighborhood search optimizer.
      Parameters:
      acceptanceCriteria - acceptance criteria for newly generated solution agent
      completionCondition - optimization completion condition
      repairer - repairer to construct a valid agent from partially destroyed agent
      destroyer - destroyer to destroy a valid agent to a partial solution
      observer - observer to get notifications of optimization process
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any input argument is null

  • Method Details

    • optimize

      public A optimize​(A agent)
      Executes the optimization process. Accepts a solution agent as input optimizes the same using destroy and repair process through multiple iterations following neighborhood search methodology and returns an optimum result.
      Specified by:
      optimize in interface Optimizer<A extends Agent>
      Parameters:
      agent - a valid solution agent representing a local optima
      Returns:
      the optimized solution agent
